DelegatedPersonal.description: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete email in user mailboxes. Does not include permission to send mail.
DelegatedPersonal.longDescription: Read and write access to user mail via IMAP

DelegatedWork.description: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete email in user mailboxes. Does not include permission to send mail.
DelegatedWork.longDescription: Read and write access to user mail via IMAP
